property.value:
While there is at least 1 Conspiracy card in play, Abbess Allegria Di Biase gains FAST, WILLPOWER, and "Cannot be wounded by card effects."
Action:Pay 1 to change one of Abbess Allegria Di Biase's $ icons into the icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

property.value: The Agency

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Conspirator. Government.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a conspiracy card enters play, search your deck for an event card, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While it is DAY, each opponent must discard a card from his hand in order to target a _ character you control.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: The Church of Gold

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
It is Day. After San Maro Basilica comes into play, destroy all NIGHT cards. San Marco Basilica is immune to non-NIGHT card effects.

Action:Exhause San Marco Basilica or pay 1 to ready an exhausted character. Then, that character gains WILLPOWER until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Attach to a _ character you control.

Disrupt: ExhaustThe Iron Cross to make The Iron Cross and attached character immune to triggered effects until the end of the phase. Then add a success token to The Iron Cross.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Fated 4.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When 1 or more characters would be put into your discard pile from play, you may instead put those characters on top of your deck.

property.value: Secret Servant

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you commit 1 or more characters to a conspiracy, search your deck for a [ event card. Reveal it and then add it to your hand. Then, add a success token to Don Lagorio.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Fated 3.

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Deep One.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action:If it is NIGHT, pay 2 to give Poleman @ @ $ until the end of the phase. Limit once per turn.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: No Longer Abandoned

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
It is NIGHT. After San Giorgio in Alga comes into play destroy all DAY cards. San Giorgio in Alga is immune to non-DAY card effects.

When you would draw a card, instead reveal 2 cards. Put one of those cards on the bottom of your deck and add the other to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice Flooded Vault to search your deck for a non-Location support card. Then, pay its printed cost and put it into play, if able. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Commit a [ character you control to a story, even if it is exhausted. Sacrifice that character at the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Destroy all DAY cards. Until the end of the phase it is NIGHT. Until the end of the phase, all [ characters gain @ #.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Finder of Madness

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Servitor. Scientist.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After a character goes insane, choose a card in that player's discard pile and put it on top of his deck, if able.

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Conspirator. Artist.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cunning Mascheraro counts its icons at each conspiracy card in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
It is NIGHT. After San Servolo comes into play destroy all DAY cards. San Servolo is immune to non-DAY cards.

Response: After a character is made to go insane, exhaust San Servolo to choose another character controlled by the same player to go insane unless its controller pays 1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character is restored, shuffle that character into its owner's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Play during the story phase.

Action: Choose and take control of an insane character (if it is NIGHT, instead take control of each insane character). Then, restore and commit that character to a single story. At the end of the phase drive that character insane and return it to its owner's control.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Cancel the effects of an event card just played and then put it on the top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Hatching a Plan

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Conspirator. Faculty.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Bruno Carioli is committed to a conspiracy, choose an icon struggle at that conspiracy. Icon struggles of the chosen type do not resolve this phase at any story card. Then, add a success token to Bruni Carioli.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Fated 2.

property.value: Miskatonic University

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Explorer. Student.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a LOCATION support card enters or leaves play, pay 1 to reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose 1 revealed ATTACHMENT support card and add it to your hand, returning the rest of the cards to your deck in the same order.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Miskatonic University

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After your opponent has committed characters to stories, if Puzzled Exchange Student is not committed to a story, commit it to a story with the most characters, even if it is exhausted.

Attach to a characer.

Day. It is Day. After Medico Della Peste comes into play destroy all NIGHTcards. Medico Della Peste is immune to non-NIGHT card effects.

Attached character doesn't exhaust to commit to stories.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Miskatonic University

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Discard X cards from your hand to choose X other cards in your discard pile and add them to your hand. Then, if it is DAY, draw a card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: @ icons do not protect characters from insanity while committed to this conspiracy. When a player commits 1 or more characters to this conspiracy he may choose and restore a character he controls.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All characters commotted to this conspiracy lose all TOUGHNESS and INVULNERABILITY. After this conspiracy card is won each player must wound each character he controls not committed to this conspiracy.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While this conspiracy is in your won pile, it gains "Disrupt:Discard 2 cards from the top of your deck to cancel an effect that would sacrifice a character you control."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you play this conspiracy, search your deck for a DAY or NIGHT card, reveal it and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. While this conspiracy is in your won pile, increase the cost of any opponent's triggered effect that target characters you control by 1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When a player succeeds at this conspiracy, that player gains a domain.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While this conspiracy card is in play, players cannot ready more than 1 character during the refresh phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When The Mage's Machinations enters play, each player must choose 1 character controlled by the player to his left, if able. Remove those characters from the game. If you win this conspiracy return those characters removed from the game to play under your control.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Holy Shard

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Relic. Item.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Day. It is DAY. After The Supernal Prism comes into play destroy all NIGHT cards.

After The Supernal Prism leaves play, shuffle it into its owner's deck.

Action: Sacrifice The Supernal to have each player discard his hand, if able. Then each player who discarded his hand draws five cards, if able.

property.value:
Night. It is NIGHT. After The Plague Stone comes into play destory all DAY cards.

After The Plague Stone leaves play, shuffle it into its owner's deck.

Action: Sacrifice The Plague Stone and pay 2 to destroy all characters in play.

While it is NIGHT characters you control gain FAST and @.

Ghoulish Scavenger gets +1 skill and # # for each face down card attached to it.

property.value: If it is NIGHT, Baleful Reveler gains # #.

Play only if it is NIGHT.

Action: Choose a non-ANCIENT ONE subtype and search your discard pile for any number of character cards that have that subtype. Ply those characters into play.

property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: If it is DAY, choose and return a character you control to its owner's hand to draw X cards. Then put X cards from your hand on top of your deck in any order. X is the cost of the chosen character.

property.value: While there is a conspiracy card in play, Salvatore Neri gains, "Action: Pay 1 to choose a character. Salvatore Neri gains the text box of the character until the end of the turn."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each opponent's character with skill 2 or less (if it is NIGHT, instead with skill 4 or less) committed to the same story as Devious Nightgaunt is treated as if its text box was blank.

property.name: Subtypes

property.name: Card Text

Attach to a character.

Attached character's controller must pay 1 each time he wishes to commit attached character to a story trigger attached character's ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character becomes a printed copy of a chosen non-unique character card in play.
